name: Ace Bird Sniper 2014 - Hunting Birds & Animals, Adult Simulator Hunter Games
name_original: Ace Bird Sniper 2014 - Hunting Birds & Animals, Adult Simulator Hunter Games
description:
HUNT or BE HUNTED! - Amazing Bird Sniper Game. With REAL TIME Multiplayer!

How many Birds and Animals can you shoot in the time limit?

Smaller animals are worth more points but are harder
to hit. Larger animals are bigger but slower so worth
less.

Challenge your friends to get the highest score!

FEATURES:

• Awesome 3D graphics
• Epic slow motion camera
• Real Time Multiplayer!

• Slick FPS controls

- Move by swiping the left of the screen
- Aim by swiping the right
- Tap left button to go into snipe mode
- Tap right button to fire

• Loads of Birds and Animals to shoot
• Addictive quick gameplay

Download NOW 100% FREE.

#BirdSniper
